thread.title: Machinists Union Endorses Jamie Raskin for Maryland 8th District
thread.title_full: Machinists Union Endorses Jamie Raskin for Maryland 8th District - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Machinists Union Endorses Jamie Raskin for Maryland 8th District
text: UPPER MARLBORO, Md.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--The Maryland State Council of Machinists is proud to endorse Maryland State Sen. Jamie Raskin (D-Montgomery), a true friend of organized labor and proven champion of progressive values, for Maryland’s 8th Congressional District seat being vacated by Rep. Chris Van Hollen (D). “This seat is an essential one for labor and Raskin has shown extraordinary leadership in the Maryland General Assembly and that he will take on the tough fights and build the coalitio ...
